prompts: Create a cocoon-like Pokemon that has a mesmerizing white exterior and a bright red dot.
Design a bug-type Pokemon with an oval shape and thorn-like protrusions all around its body.
Imagine a small insect Pokemon that blends perfectly with plant life and has a gentle demeanor.
Generate a unique Pokemon that evolves from a caterpillar and features a soft, plush-like texture.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a silken cocoon, showcasing shades of white and a vibrant accent color.
Show me a creature that can camouflage in grasslands, featuring spiky edges and a round body.
I want a timid bug Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a shiny, reflective surface.
